Just to let know my Torrent postings are going slow down... Its just that nobody ever rates them and nobody ever leaves comments ( sometimes ... very rare)
Think Zarre_99 has a point
And Albert2172, whats the point of re-encoding to share if nobody downloading really care, and who know what people want if nobody comments

Keep up good work mate.
You were recommended by me, don't know how/why they skipped....

bog23man I appreciate your Torrents. Sorry if I forget to rate. Most of the time I Magnet Link the torrent and then don't return to the page. Your torrents are appreciated. but most people like me only comment or  rate if there is something wrong.

I appreciate your Torrents. Sorry if I forget to rate. Most of the time I Magnet Link the torrent and then don't return to the page. Your torrents are appreciated. but most people like me only comment or  rate if there is something wrong.
u the only person i ever download torrents form i think every thing u do  is awesome thank u for every think u do plz dont stop
if u could get the american pie movies that would be cool not the new ones but the older ones

Thankyou so much for all of you uploads.  My apartment was recently broken into and they took all of my dvds. 90% of which were horror films from the 80's.  I have an apple tv and the collections you have put up will go a long way to restoring that collection!!  You even have the Basket Case movies up!  I feel like I just met a kindred spirit.  If there is a way you could continue seeding the older posts, i.e., Hellraiser series, things like that it would be most apprectiated.  Thanks again!!
